title: 820-2936 no logical activity
message:
Good morning, I have a mac that came with fan spin, but it won't start.
PPVCORE_S0_CPU : stucked on 1.1V
I've tried another BIOS, but without success. I've tried other RAM memories too and found small oxidations on the contacts of the memory slots, I cleaned them but nothing changed.
I noticed that after testing with a good BIOS, the mac did not recognize the RAM memories at times, displaying an individual beep, as if there were no memories installed. I tested good memories individually in each slot, but the beeps are intermittent. With or without beeps, PPVCORE_S0_CPU is still locked at 1.1V
 Do you have any suggestions? Thanks!

title: 820-2936 no logical activity
message:
Any history fault available?
Test the RAM slots with DDR3 test card.

title: 820-2936 no logical activity
message:
No history available.
I don't own a RAM slots tester. Can you recommend a quality one to buy?

title: 820-2936 no logical activity
message: eBay, or Aliexpress; quality is question of luck there...
